data.actual_result: The GIF does not update to the new user card.
data.expected_result: The GIF will update to the current user avatar.
data.short_description: If you go into DM's with a friend, then select mutual friends and open the profile (MUST HAVE A GIF), the GIF stays the same but the username does not.
data.steps_to_repro: - Head into DM's with a friend that has a GIF + has mutual friends. - Open one of the mutual friends playercards up.
